info.name: Frotcom API - AFTECH
info.description: API collection for Frotcom vehicle tracking system with AFTECH credentials

exec: // Save the token to collection variable

request.description: Authenticate with Frotcom API and retrieve access token. The token will be automatically saved to the collection variable 'api_key' for use in subsequent requests.
Returns all vehicles currently associated with the AFTECH account. The 'id' field from this response corresponds to the 'loadUnitId' used in tracking endpoints.

response.name: Get All Vehicles

request.description: Retrieves the latest tracking data for all vehicles. The loadUnitId in the response corresponds to the id field from the /v2/vehicles endpoint.

response.name: Get Latest Tracking Data
